nm_museum.description: Drive by the Billy The Kid Museum (requires New Mexico DLC)

id_45th_parallel.name: 45th Parallel
id_45th_parallel.description: Visit 45th parallel in Idaho - a halfway between the Equator and the North Pole (requires Idaho DLC)

aca_pass_conditions.name: Advanced Student
aca_pass_conditions.description: Complete the pass conditions in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

ne_agriculture.name: Agriculture Expert
ne_agriculture.description: Complete one delivery of corn, grain, potatoes and soybean from or within Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

ks_engine_wing.name: Air Capital of the World
ks_engine_wing.description: Deliver an Aircraft Wing and Jet Engine Inlets to or from at least 2 aviation depots in Wichita (requires Kansas DLC)

id_snake_river.name: Along the Snake River
id_snake_river.description: Complete perfect deliveries (no damage, no fines, on time) between the following cities: Kennewick - Lewiston; Boise - Twin Falls; Twin Falls - Pocatello; Pocatello - Idaho Falls. Any order or direction counts (requires Washington and Idaho DLCs)

tx_markers.name: Avid Historian
tx_markers.description: Discover at least 30 historical markers in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

ut_visit_cities.name: Beehive State
ut_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

wy_train.name: Big Boy
wy_train.description: Deliver Train Axles, Tamping Machine and Rails to or from the rail yard in Cheyenne (requires Wyoming DLC)

tx_cutscenes.name: Big Country Views
tx_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 25 viewpoints in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

st_all_cargos.name: Big in America!
st_all_cargos.description: Complete at least 10 unique deliveries of oversize cargoes (requires Special Transport DLC)

mt_cutscenes.name: Big Sky Country
mt_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 10 viewpoints in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

ok_big_tyres.name: Big Wheels Keep On Turning
ok_big_tyres.description: Complete 3 deliveries of Big Tyres cargo from at least 1 tyre factory in Lawton or Ardmore (requires Oklahoma DLC)

hc_100k5jobs.name: Bigger Cargo, Bigger Profit
hc_100k5jobs.description: Earn $100,000 on 5 consecutive Heavy Cargo Pack deliveries (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_100k5jobs.group: American Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Pack

wy_cattle.name: Buffalo Bill
wy_cattle.description: Complete 10 excellent cattle deliveries to livestock auctions in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

or_cabbage_hill.name: Cabbage to Cabbage
or_cabbage_hill.description: Complete a delivery of vegetables over Cabbage Hill (requires Oregon DLC)

ca_visit_cities.name: California Dreamin'
ca_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 15 cities in California

ok_cutscenes.name: Can Do!
ok_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 6 viewpoints in Oklahoma (requires Oklahoma DLC)

ks_secret_roads.name: Can you Keep a Secret?
ks_secret_roads.description: Discover at least 3 unmarked roads in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

ca_country.name: Cheers!
ca_country.description: Deliver cargo from at least 3 vineyards in California

jobs15comp.name: Company Collector
jobs15comp.description: Perform deliveries for at least 15 different companies

az_visit_cities.name: Copper State
az_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 12 cities in Arizona

ne_visit_cities.name: Cornhusker State
ne_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

tx_cotton.name: Cotton Bloom
tx_cotton.description: Complete 10 deliveries of at least one Cotton Lint, Cotton Seed and Cotton Harvester within Texas (requires Texas and Heavy Cargo Pack DLCs)

co_tunnels.name: Cruising High Below
co_tunnels.description: Drive through the Eisenhower-Johnson Memorial Tunnel, the highest point on the US Interstate Highway System, in both directions (requires Colorado DLC)

aca_truck_driving.name: Dedicated Student
aca_truck_driving.description: Complete at least 28 scenarios in Truck Driving Basics including the final exams (Driving Academy)

co_wind_turbine.name: Energy From Above
co_wind_turbine.description: Deliver a Tower and Nacelle to at least 1 Vitas Power wind turbine construction site in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

aca_consecutive.name: Failure Is Not an Option
aca_consecutive.description: Complete any 5 scenarios in a row without failure from the third or fourth chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

tx_farms_auction_houses.name: Farm Away
tx_farms_auction_houses.description: Deliver cargo to or from at least 5 farms and 2 livestock auctions in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

wa_use_ferry.name: Ferry Tales
wa_use_ferry.description: Use a ferry to cross the water (requires Washington DLC)

maxed_garage.name: Final Makeover
maxed_garage.description: Fully upgrade one of your garages

nm_shortcut.name: Forest Shortcut
nm_shortcut.description: Discover shortcut through the forest (requires New Mexico DLC)

co_four_corners.name: Four Corners
co_four_corners.description: Visit the famous Four Corners Monument that marks where the states of Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico, and Utah meet (requires Colorado DLC)

id_visit_cities.name: Gem State
id_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Idaho (requires Idaho DLC)

st_helicopter.name: Get (to) the Chopper!
st_helicopter.description: Successfully deliver a Helicopter Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

aca_first.name: Get the Ball Rollin'
aca_first.description: Complete the first scenario of the first chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

st_all_routes.name: Go Big or Go Home
st_all_routes.description: Complete deliveries on at least 10 oversize routes in base game (requires Special Transport DLC)

nv_quarries.name: Gold Fever
nv_quarries.description: Deliver cargo to at least 1 quarry in Nevada

co_gold_mine.name: Gold Rush
co_gold_mine.description: Deliver 10 loads to or from the NAMIQ company at the gold mine in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

ia_cutscenes.name: Golden Acres Explorer
ia_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)

ks_salt_food.name: Grain of Salt
ks_salt_food.description: Complete 6 deliveries from the Hutchinson Salt Mine in Kansas. At least 2 deliveries must be to a Food Factory (requires Kansas DLC)

id_potatoes.name: Grown in Idaho
id_potatoes.description: Complete five deliveries of potatoes from Idaho farms (requires Idaho DLC)

hc_perf_job.name: Heavy, but Not Bull in a China Shop!
hc_perf_job.description: Complete excellent delivery of a cargo from the Heavy Cargo Pack which is at least 1,000 miles long (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_perf_job.group: American Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Pack

perf_job.name: High Five
perf_job.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) for a job that is at least 600 miles

st_house.name: Home Sweet Home
st_house.description: Successfully deliver a Turnkey House Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

hc_weigh170k.name: How Heavy Am I?!
hc_weigh170k.description: Use truck scale or weigh station with gross vehicle weight of at least 175,000 lbs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_weigh170k.group: American Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Pack

ar_cutscenes.name: I Saw Arkansas
ar_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

hc_allcargos.name: I Thought This Should Be Heavy?!
hc_allcargos.description: Complete a delivery of at least 8 unique cargoes from the Heavy Cargo Pack (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_allcargos.group: American Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Pack

ut_sign.name: It's Something
ut_sign.description: Find a sign that says "nothing" (requires Utah DLC)

wa_marina.name: Keep Sailing
wa_marina.description: Deliver a boat to a marina in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

fm_3_perfect.name: Leave No Branch Behind!
fm_3_perfect.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of at least 3 Forest Machinery DLC jobs (requires Forest Machinery DLC)

harddifficlt.name: Like a Boss
harddifficlt.description: Successfully park a trailer at a hard delivery point

fm_all_cargos.name: Logged-In
fm_all_cargos.description: Complete delivery of at least 4 Forest Machinery DLC cargoes (requires Forest Machinery DLC)

or_timber_harvest.name: Lumberjack
or_timber_harvest.description: Deliver cargo from at least 4 timber harvest sites in Oregon (requires Oregon DLC)

ia_bridge.description: Cross the iconic bridge in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)

mt_miner.name: Major Miner
mt_miner.description: Complete excellent delivery of any machinery equipment to the Bull Mountains coal mine, Silane from the silane gas factory and Talc Powder from the talc factory (requires Montana DLC)

co_us550.name: Million Dollar Highway
co_us550.description: Drive along this famously scenic and thrilling section of the U.S. 550 in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

ne_cutscenes.name: Nebraska Explorer
ne_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 6 viewpoints in Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

aca_stars.name: Nerd of the Road
aca_stars.description: Obtain 3 stars in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

no_autopark.name: Not a Problem
no_autopark.description: Successfully park a trailer at a delivery point

st_aircondition.name: One, Two, Three - Breathe!
st_aircondition.description: Successfully deliver an Air Conditioning Complex Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

aca_no_forward.name: One-Shottin' It
aca_no_forward.description: Complete any scenario in fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics in one attempt without correcting by driving forward (Driving Academy)

wy_cutscenes.name: Over Plains and Mountains
wy_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

la_bridges.name: Over the Bayou
la_bridges.description: Cross two draw bridges in Louisiana (requires Louisiana DLC)

wa_forest.description: Drive through the forest road to timber harvest in Bellingham (requires Washington DLC)

mo_cutscenes.name: Ozark Explorer
mo_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 12 viewpoints in Missouri (requires Missouri DLC)

ar_paper.name: Paper Trail
ar_paper.description: Complete 3 deliveries of Logs to Chuck & Jack's, and 3 deliveries of Wood Shavings to Page & Price Paper, within Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

la_cutscenes.name: Parish Explorer
la_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Louisiana (requires Louisiana DLC)

unload_difficulty.name: Parking Challenge
unload_difficulty.description: Complete 20 deliveries choosing the trailer delivery option which requires reversing

la_visit_cities.name: Pelican State
la_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Louisiana (requires Louisiana DLC)

ia_live_pigs.name: Piggy Express
ia_live_pigs.description: Complete a live pigs cargo delivery from two livestock farms in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)

wy_buford.name: Population 1
wy_buford.description: Discover and visit the town of Buford (requires Wyoming DLC)

az_colorado.name: Powell's Trail
az_colorado.description: Visit at least 4 Colorado River sights

mt_electric.name: Power On!
mt_electric.description: Spark up Montana and support the power network by delivering a Circuit Breakers cargo and a Utility Poles cargo to the electric substations in each of the following cities: Butte, Glasgow and Havre (requires Montana DLC)

aca_interior.description: Complete at least 6 scenarios in the fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics while using only the interior camera (Driving Academy)

ut_frac_tank.name: Pump It Up
ut_frac_tank.description: Deliver frac tank trailer to at least 5 oil drilling sites in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

aca_manual_transmission.name: Rowing Through the Gears

ok_bus_factory.description: Deliver 5 Bus Hood cargoes to and 5 School Bus cargoes from the bus factory in Tulsa (requires Oklahoma DLC)

aca_stars_consecutive.description: Obtain 3 stars in any 3 scenarios played in a row in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

la_shipyard.description: Deliver iron pipes, metal coils, and lumber to any shipyard in Louisiana for oil tanker construction (requires Louisiana DLC)

st_perf_job.description: Successfully deliver a Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

ks_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

ut_mines.name: This One Is Mine!
ut_mines.description: Visit at least 2 mines and quarries in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

hc_firstjob.description: Deliver first Heavy Cargo Pack job (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

or_landmarks.name: Travel Oregon
or_landmarks.description: Discover following landmarks of Oregon: Crater Lake, Crooked River Gorge, Thor's Well and Yaquina Head Lighthouse (requires Oregon DLC)

wa_landmarks.description: Visit Mount St. Helens, Grand Coulee Dam, Mount Rainier (requires Washington DLC)
